attributes.action: Keep our Thorne South train station open and working.
attributes.additional_details:
The price of living is costing people out of many things. 
Public transport is very well needed in our towns, we need to stay connected more than ever right now.
attributes.background: Keep Our Thorne South, (Doncaster) train station open and working for the public, our towns rely on our two train stations to keep us connected. Workers also rely on the public transport we have.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Thorne South station is open, and we can't find any evidence that it is being closed.

You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what you are concerned about and what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
